tasks.label: Run: Supervisor (foreground)
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path '.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe') { Write-Host 'Run: .\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe tools\\qe_cli.py supervisor --config config\\supervisor.yaml' } else { Write-Host 'Create .venv: python -m venv .venv'; Write-Host 'Install deps: pip install -r requirements\\requirements.txt'; Write-Host 'Then run: .\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe tools\\qe_cli.py supervisor --config config\\supervisor.yaml' }"
